BasicInfo.short: Alohar Mobile offers a location-based, ambient-sensing platform that enables developers to build customized mobile apps.

Products.name: PlaceUs
Products.description: Share your journeys with those close to you. Easily gain insight, reduce stress, and simplify everyday tasks.
